#summary createXXX(...)
#labels api,1.0

*Category*:

[ModelObjectFunctions Model Object Functions]

*Description*:

Dynamic shortcut method, see [create create()] for more info. Replace `XXX` with the name of an association you have set up either through [hasOne hasOne()] or [hasMany hasMany()].

*Examples*:

{{{
<!--- a "hasOne" or "hasMany" association from "customer" to "order" is required --->
<cfset aCustomer = model("customer").findByKey(params.customerId)>

<cfset anOrder = aCustomer.createOrder(shipping=params.shipping)>
=
<cfset anOrder = model("order").create(customerId=params.customerId, shipping=params.shipping)>
}}}
